      • displayAvailableSpace

        public static final java.awt.Dimension displayAvailableSpace()
        Method displayAvailableSpace.

        It return the dimension of the screen.

        Returns:
        Dimension(w,h) New Dimension object initialized with the screen width and height

      • VisualiserAvailableSpace

        public static final java.awt.Dimension VisualiserAvailableSpace()
        Method VisualiserAvailableSpace.

        It return the dimension of the screen avaible for the VisualiserPanel.

        Returns:
        Dimension(w,h) New Dimension object initialized with the screen width and height without the space occupied by the GalaxyPanel
